column4: Basic problem: I just formatted over an NTFS HD with ext3, trying to use testdisk to fix that.
So my first question is why ubuntu would call a drive /dev/sdb, when other things (like testdisk) think it's /dev/sdc
It was a quick format, some may be retrievable.
there is software that searches a device for files and saves them .. photorec is one.. magicrescue is another
